content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Food, service, and ambiance is amazing! Thank you to our amazing  server John! He took care of us all night! Anything and everything we got was good! From the beef, pork, and even cold noodle options, it was all good! They have a restaurant inside that takes advanced reservations. The patio is walk-in only. They have a bar too. You can find parking at the equitable plaza; it's a $5 flat rate on nights and weekends.
